casebody.data:
John Joseph MERZBACHER, petitioner,
v.
Bobby P. SHEARIN, et al.; and John Joseph Merzbacher, petitioner,
v.
Bobby P. Shearin, et al. No. 12-9952. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 706 F.3d 356.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
